title: Build Backrooms & Dreamcore Website

requirements.text: Replace the entire existing landing page with a new website themed around the Backrooms and Dreamcore aesthetic. Completely overwrite App.tsx and all existing section components with new content, copy, and structure suited to this theme. Remove all references to 'Dark Fantasy by Ricay', photo enhancement services, pricing, testimonials, and knight imagery.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: No references to 'Dark Fantasy by Ricay' or photo enhancement remain anywhere on the page
All section content is replaced with Backrooms/Dreamcore themed content
Old knight images are no longer referenced

requirements.text: Apply a Backrooms and Dreamcore visual theme consistently across the entire site. Use muted yellowed-fluorescent greens (#c8c87a, #b5b84a), off-white (#e8e8d8), liminal beige (#d4c9a0), and deep void black (#080808) as the primary palette. Accent with ghostly pale cyan (#a8d8d8) and faded lavender (#c4b8d8) for dreamcore softness. Typography should use a monospace or typewriter-style font for headings to evoke unsettling liminal space, paired with a clean sans-serif for body text. Apply subtle noise/grain texture overlays, flickering or pulsing CSS animations on accent elements, and a pervasive feeling of vast empty space and eerie quiet. The aesthetic must feel unsettling yet dreamlike — not horror or gore.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette consistently uses yellowed-fluorescent, beige, and void black tones
Noise/grain texture overlay is visible on section backgrounds
At least one flickering or pulsing CSS animation is present on accent elements
Typography uses a monospace/typewriter-style font for headings

requirements.text: Build a full-screen Hero section with the headline 'You Weren't Supposed to Find This', a subheadline 'Welcome to the Backrooms — infinite liminal space beyond the boundaries of reality', and a single CTA button labeled 'Enter'. Include a subtle looping CSS animation suggesting flickering fluorescent light in the background. Display a muted yellowed environment image (generated asset) as the hero background with a heavy dark vignette overlay.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline reads 'You Weren't Supposed to Find This'
Flickering fluorescent CSS animation is present
Hero background uses the generated Backrooms environment image
'Enter' CTA button is visible and styled

requirements.text: Build a 'What Are The Backrooms?' lore section with atmospheric copy explaining the concept of liminal spaces, noclipping out of reality, and the endless fluorescent-lit corridors of Level 0. Use large pull-quote typography for key phrases like 'No exits. No entities. Just you and the hum of fluorescent lights.' alongside a generated image of a long empty hallway.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Section contains explanatory lore copy about the Backrooms
At least one large pull-quote is present
Generated hallway image is displayed alongside the text

requirements.text: Build a 'Levels' section showcasing a grid of four Backrooms levels: Level 0 (The Lobby — infinite yellow carpeted rooms), Level 1 (Habitable Zone — concrete warehouses), Level ! (The False Level — dreamcore pastel distortion), and The Poolrooms (flooded iridescent rooms with dreamlike calm). Each level card should show a generated image, the level name, a short evocative description, and a subtle glow border on hover matching the level's color palette.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Four level cards are displayed in a grid layout
Each card has a generated image, level name, and short description
Hover glow effect is present on each card
Level colors differ per card to reflect each level's atmosphere

requirements.text: Build a 'Dreamcore' section explaining the Dreamcore aesthetic — surreal, nostalgic imagery evoking half-remembered dreams, empty playgrounds at dusk, pastel skies, and a feeling of beautiful melancholy. Include a visual mood board grid of four generated dreamcore scene images (empty swing set at twilight, pastel infinite hallway, misty lake at dawn, soft-lit empty pool) arranged in a masonry-style layout.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Section contains Dreamcore explanatory copy
Four generated dreamcore images are displayed in a grid or masonry layout
Section uses softer pastel accent colors contrasting with the darker Backrooms sections

requirements.text: Build a 'Survival Guide' section styled as a distressed text document or typewriter note. List five survival tips for navigating the Backrooms: Stay calm and do not run, Follow the hum of electricity toward exits, Avoid wet areas — they attract entities, Document everything you find, Remember: most levels are survivable. Use a monospace font, subtle paper texture background, and faded ink styling.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays five survival tips
Content is styled to resemble a typewritten or distressed document
Monospace font and paper/grain texture are applied to this section

requirements.text: Build a Footer section with the site name 'Into The Backrooms', a tagline 'The walls are not what they seem.', and navigation links that smooth-scroll to each section. Include a small disclaimer: 'This site is a fan-made creative project inspired by the Backrooms and Dreamcore internet aesthetics.' Style with the same muted, liminal color palette.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows site name 'Into The Backrooms' and tagline
Smooth-scroll navigation links are present
Fan project disclaimer is included
Footer uses the site's liminal color palette

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to replace the existing dark fantasy design tokens with the Backrooms/Dreamcore palette: fluorescent yellow-green (#c8c87a, #b5b84a), liminal beige (#d4c9a0), off-white (#e8e8d8), void black (#080808), pale cyan (#a8d8d8), and faded lavender (#c4b8d8). Add a CSS noise/grain texture utility class using an SVG filter or repeating background pattern. Add a 'flicker' keyframe animation for the fluorescent light effect.

acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind config includes the new Backrooms/Dreamcore color tokens
CSS noise/grain utility class is defined
'flicker' CSS keyframe animation is present

requirements.text: Render all generated Backrooms and Dreamcore images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and update all component src references to use these paths.

quotes: Make me a website about the backrooms and dreamcore

acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are referenced from frontend/public/assets/generated
No broken image links exist on the page

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
All generated images must be placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
nonGoals: No backend logic or data persistence is needed
No user accounts, authentication, or Internet Identity integration
No e-commerce, pricing tiers, or photo upload functionality
